original_text:
He does not lend to them at interest
    or take a profit from them.
He withholds his hand from doing wrong
    and judges fairly between two parties.
korean_text: 변리를 위하여 꾸어 주지 아니하며 이자를 받지 아니하며 스스로 손을 금하여 죄를 짓지 아니하며 사람과 사람 사이에 진실하게 판단하며

sentences.original_text: He does not lend to them at interest
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 이자를 붙여 빌려주지 않으며

sentences.original_text: or take a profit from them
He withholds his hand from doing wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 손을 불의한 행위에서 멀리하며

sentences.original_text: and judges fairly between two parties
